activities:
The Smartify platform collects basic demographic information from participants - email, dob, zipcode, ip address.  These are used for reporting at the aggregate level.

In addition, the Smartify platform collects various pieces of information from third party system such as Facebook or Twitter.  These are used for aggregate analytics for our clients.

We also track specific behaviour - how end-users interact with our products. This information is used by our clients to visualize and understand the performance of their campaigns and users.  

The data is not sold to third parties for advertising purposes.  The primary goal of the platform is to provide our clients with a good understanding of their users at an aggregate level.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
